thread.section_title: Dairy Queen and Rita’s Are Giving Out Free Ice Cream and Italian Ice Monday – Fortune
thread.title: Dairy Queen and Rita’s Are Giving Out Free Ice Cream and Italian Ice Monday
thread.title_full: Dairy Queen and Rita’s Are Giving Out Free Ice Cream and Italian Ice Monday

author: Lucinda Shen
title: Dairy Queen and Rita’s Are Giving Out Free Ice Cream and Italian Ice Monday
text:
Dairy Queen is offering a free cone on Monday, the first day of spring.
While most fans will be able to get the free small-sized vanilla cone at participating Dairy Queen locations, a few lucky winners will receive their cone via drone .
Dairy Queen will also be collecting donations for Children’s Miracle Network Hospitals, which focus on the quality of care for children in hospitals. Last year, over $200,000 was raised on Free Cone Day .
Customers will be able to find the free treat at all participating non-mall U.S. locations.
Separately, Rita’s Italian Ice will also be offering a scoop of its signature dish between the hours of 12 p.m. and 9 p.m . at participating locations Monday.
